name: Heros Archer Fighting 3D
description:
Heros Archer Fighting 3D!!!
Become a Heroes legend, and lead your Clan to victory in this incredible, unique and epic MMORPG gaming experience
- Side-scrolling action for easy control
- Quickly slash through enemies with diverse and dynamic gameplay
- A colourful and powerful combination of skills
- Fight against a diverse range of enemy fighting styles and massive bosses
